butterfly-kiss-shaver.description: Improved Performance The new generation Butterfly Kiss shaver comes with an improved design and unbeatable performance. Made of best in class materials the shaver was produced using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The large flexing rotary blades allow covering large areas of the body on a single pass. The strong casing ensures maximum protection and durable use for your shaver. Shave in the Shower The Butterfly Kiss is enriched with IPX5 water resistance technology. Being water resistant it simplifies the shaving process, allowing to use the shaver in the shower, as well as rinsing it under running water. It is up to you to choose the way you shave: wet or dry shave, with or without shaving foam, gel or soap. Butterfly Kiss offers a perfectly clean shave and exceptionally excellent results no matter which option you choose. 5-head Forte Blade The Butterfly Kiss shaver comes with a 5-head Forte blade. The pivoting rotary heads of the blade easily flex to adjust to the contours of your body to ensure an efficient and close shave. Thanks to the supreme quality materials and re-engineered blade design, you will experience an exceptionally fast and safe shave within a few minutes. Shave Anytime, Anywhere, with No Mess Due to the high-performance lithium-ion battery (600 mAh), the Butterfly Kiss offers 60 minutes of cordless operation allowing to shave whenever and wherever you want. The women’s shaver also perfectly works in "plug and shave" mode. Butterfly Kiss is a must-have for women who tend to travel frequently as it is an excellent solution for shaving on the go: the in-built vacuum technology collects all the hair within the shaver and ensures a mess-free shaving experience. No Nicks. No Cuts. The pivoting neck adjusts to the contours and curves of your body ensuring a perfect shave without causing any skin irritation, nicks and cuts. The ergonomic handle allows easy manipulation of the shaver adjusting to the shape of your body without missing any single hair. The new innovated Butterfly Kiss offers exceptional flexibility resulting in unbeatable performance and outstanding results. LED Battery Life Indicator Butterfly Kiss women’s shaver is equipped with a LED light indicator to show the battery charge level. This lets you know when exactly the shaver needs to be recharged. The indicator is green when the shaver is charged and turns red once the battery runs low. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged. Easy Cleaning Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Skull Shaver Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of your shavers. Simply immerse the blades of the shaver into the rinse stand with warm water. You can alternatively use a bowl with warm water. Turn on the shaver and wait for 10-15 seconds. That’s it, the shaver is clean and ready for the next use. For better performance, It is recommended to rinse the shaver after each use.

Improved Performance

The new generation Butterfly Kiss shaver comes with an improved design and unbeatable performance. Made of best in class materials the shaver was produced using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The large flexing rotary blades allow covering large areas of the body on a single pass. The strong casing ensures maximum protection and durable use for your shaver.

Shave in the Shower

The Butterfly Kiss is enriched with IPX5 water resistance technology. Being water resistant it simplifies the shaving process, allowing to use the shaver in the shower, as well as rinsing it under running water. It is up to you to choose the way you shave: wet or dry shave, with or without shaving foam, gel or soap. Butterfly Kiss offers a perfectly clean shave and exceptionally excellent results no matter which option you choose.

5-head Forte Blade

The Butterfly Kiss shaver comes with a 5-head Forte blade. The pivoting rotary heads of the blade easily flex to adjust to the contours of your body to ensure an efficient and close shave. Thanks to the supreme quality materials and re-engineered blade design, you will experience an exceptionally fast and safe shave within a few minutes.

Shave Anytime, Anywhere, with No Mess

Due to the high-performance lithium-ion battery (600 mAh), the Butterfly Kiss offers 60 minutes of cordless operation allowing to shave whenever and wherever you want. The women’s shaver also perfectly works in "plug and shave" mode. Butterfly Kiss is a must-have for women who tend to travel frequently as it is an excellent solution for shaving on the go: the in-built vacuum technology collects all the hair within the shaver and ensures a mess-free shaving experience.

No Nicks. No Cuts.

The pivoting neck adjusts to the contours and curves of your body ensuring a perfect shave without causing any skin irritation, nicks and cuts. The ergonomic handle allows easy manipulation of the shaver adjusting to the shape of your body without missing any single hair. The new innovated Butterfly Kiss offers exceptional flexibility resulting in unbeatable performance and outstanding results.

LED Battery Life Indicator

Butterfly Kiss women’s shaver is equipped with a LED light indicator to show the battery charge level. This lets you know when exactly the shaver needs to be recharged. The indicator is green when the shaver is charged and turns red once the battery runs low. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged.

Easy Cleaning

Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Skull Shaver Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of your shavers. Simply immerse the blades of the shaver into the rinse stand with warm water. You can alternatively use a bowl with warm water. Turn on the shaver and wait for 10-15 seconds. pitbull-silver-plus-head-and-face-shaver.description: .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Innovative design for maximum comfort A reinvented and remastered design with the use of best in class materials to offer unconventional comfort during shaving. Pitbull Silver Plus men’s shaver is equipped with our signature patented innovative ergonomic handle which offers easy grip and perfectly fits your hand to ensure comfortable and intuitive shaving of your head and face. Thanks to the unique design the shaver easily gets to all tough to reach areas ensuring impeccable results. Improved performance Discover the third generation of Skull Shaver products with improved design and unbeatable performance. The new Pitbull Silver Plus is made of high-quality materials using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The shaver uses 22%* larger drive gear for stronger shaving capacity and better results. The strong casing ensures maximum protection and durable use for your shaver. IPX5 Water resistance technology Pitbull Silver Plus electric shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water-resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower, as well as easily rinsing your shaver under the running water. Naturally, Pitbull shavers are also perfectly adapted for dry shaving offering high-quality close shave and exceptional results. Pitbull Silver Plus gives you the freedom to shave the way you prefer. Wet or dry, with shaving foam or without. The results are impeccable each time. 30 minutes of cordless use Pitbull Silver Plus electric shaver is equipped with a powerful integrated lithium-ion battery (600 mAh) which allows quick charging and 30 minutes of cordless use. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at your convenience. This also makes Pitbull Silver Plus a must-have for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver also perfectly works in plug and shave mode: a great alternative in case you forgot to charge it. Battery life indicator Know exactly when your shaver should be charged. The Pitbull Silver Plus electric shaver is equipped with a LED light indicating the level of the battery, which is green when the shaver is charged and turns red once the battery runs low. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged. Two blades included Experience the exceptional close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered Pitbull Carver blades designed specifically for Pitbull Silver Plus ensuring great results and protection for your skin. The upgraded Pitbull Carver blades have 10%* larger cutting area, which significantly reduces the time spent on shaving. The precision blades are built in a strong casing for durable use and protection. The CR-3 Blades are perfect for face shaving. CR-3 Blades offer unique flexing and pivoting heads, allowing the blade to conform to tight contours and shave in tight spots. Pivoting neck for extra reach Get easy access and extra reach to all areas of your head face and neck thanks to the ultra-flexible pivoting shaver neck that closely follows every curve. Each of the five rotary heads has multi-directional rotation to adjust to the shape of your head without missing any single hair. The new and rebuilt Pitbull Silver Plus offers 33%* more flexibility to ensure unbeatable performance and exceptional results. Easy Cleaning Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Platinum Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of Pitbull shavers. Simply place your shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. And that’s it. Your shaver is clean and ready for next use. Alternatively, you can use a bowl with water to clean your device.

For best results use the Platinum Rinse Stand included with Pitbull Platinum specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of Pitbull shavers. Simply place you shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. And that’s it. Your shaver is clean and ready for next use.

Great for travelers

Great for travelers Pitbull Platinum is specifically designed to suit your needs while traveling. The shaver is equipped with smart travel lock to prevent it from turning on while in your luggage. Additionally, Pitbull Platinum comes with a convenient Travel Case that is perfect for storage and safe transportation of your shaver and related accessories.

butterfly-pro-ladies-electric-shaver-for.description: Unique design with ergonomic handle Enjoy the ease and comfort of shaving different areas of your body thanks to the innovative unique design of Butterfly electric shaver. The patented ergonomic handle easily fits between your fingers and in the palm of your hand to offer you exceptional results with just a few intuitive movements. 5 large heads for glide and smooth shave of large areas The women shaver is equipped with 5 large flexing heads which have extra sharp cutting blades allowing the closest shave in all areas of the body. Thanks to the unique technology the shaver adjusts to the contours of the body, efficiently cutting the hair and leaving the skin smooth and silky. Safe shave with no skin irritation Painless shaving of even the most delicate areas of your skin in just few minutes. Enjoy the easy and intuitive clean shave, that gives your skin a soft and silky touch. Forget about the skin irritation, burns, nicks and cuts, thanks to the precision blades that allow safe shaving for you body. 90 minutes cordless use in one charge Shave whenever you want and wherever you want thanks to the integrated powerful lithium ion battery, which once fully charged can offer up to 90 minutes of cordless operation. Butterfly Pro Shaver is a must-have while traveling, as it can be used at any moment. And if you forgot to charge your shaver you can always use it while plugged. LED display with battery level indicator The Butterfly Pro shaver is designed to ensure comfortable and easy use. Thanks to the integrated LED screen battery life indicator you know exactly how much you can still use your shaver and when is the right time to charge it. The performance of the shaver remains stable until the battery is fully depleted. IPX4 water resistance Butterfly Pro shaver is equipped with IPX5 water resistance technology which makes you shaver 100% waterproof and safe to use in the shower. This gives the freedom of choosing how to shave. Wet or dry, with or without shaving foam, the choice is yours. The result is always the same: smooth and silky skin without any single hair left. Easy cleaning Easy maintenance of your Butterfly Pro shaver, to ensure long life and great performance. The cleaning of your device takes only few seconds. For best results use the Skull Shaver Rinse Stand. Simply place you shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. Alternatively, you can rinse it under warm running water.

1-year-extended-warranty.description: Purchase an Extended Warranty for your Skull Shaver and get extra peace of mind knowing that your investment is covered. This Extended Warranty covers all Skull Shaver handle/rechargeable battery/motor units and internal circuitry from defects in materials and worksmanship. This Extended Warranty does not extend or provide coverage for shaver blades or accessories. Purchase of our Extended Warranty grants the purchaser one year of extra coverage from manufacturer defects in materials and worksmanship. Please see the timeframes below to determine the start date of your extra coverage. If purchased at time of shaver purchase If this extended warranty is purchased at the time of shaver purchase, this Extended Warranty extends the 1 Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty for 1 additional year, providing a total of 2 years of coverage from the date of purchase. If purchased after the original shaver purchase, but still within original manufacturer warranty period If this warranty is purchased after the time of your shaver purchase, but still within the Limited 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty coverage period, this Extended Warranty coverage will begin one year from the expiration of the original Limited Warranty (one year from the date of original purchase), providing you two full years of coverage from the original time of purchase. If purchased after the original Limited 1 Year Warranty has expired, or for a genuine Skull Shaver clipper or shaver purchased from an unauthorized reseller If this warranty is purchased after the expiration of the Limited 1 Year Manfacturer Warranty, or if your shaver was purchased from a source other than an authorized reseller, your warranty coverage will begin at the time of Extended Warranty purchase. This warranty is void and no repair or replacement will be made under this warranty or otherwise if:1. The product is modified in any manner or repaired by anyone other than Skull Shaver or our authorized service provider.2. The product has been used commercially or subjected to unreasonable use. This warranty gives you specific legal rights and you may also have other rights which may vary from state to state. No other written express warranty is given. Any implied warranty, including any warranty of merchant which may arise from purchase or use, is limited to up to 1-year period provided in this express warranty. Some states may not allow such limitation, so it may not apply to you. No responsibility is assumed for incidental or consequential damages of any type, or for the use of unauthorized attachments. Some states may not allow the exclusion or limitation of incidental or consequential damages, so the limitation or exclusion may not apply to you. Warranty is valid in the US only. Outside US check with the store for our authorized distributor's warranty. If your shaver body, battery, or electronics fail and you would like to activate your coverage, please go to https://www.skullshaver.com/rma and fill out the form located at the bottom of the page. Please be sure to include the correct order number which shows the purchase of your Extended Warranty so we can correctly verify your order and quickly process your replacement. We will review your request, and when approved, you will receive an email with further instructions. The email will include information on where to send your shaver body/handle/battery and how to submit it for warranty repair. Skull shaver is not responsible for customs or import fees if shipping a replacement outside the US. Once your shaver is received by our processing center, please allow up to 7 business days for processing.

pitbull-silver-plus-head-and-face-shaver.description: Innovative design for maximum comfort A reinvented and remastered design with the use of best in class materials to offer unconventional comfort during shaving. Pitbull Silver Plus men’s shaver is equipped with our signature patented innovative ergonomic handle which offers easy grip and perfectly fits your hand to ensure comfortable and intuitive shaving of your head and face. Thanks to the unique design the shaver easily gets to all tough to reach areas ensuring impeccable results. Improved performance Discover the third generation of Skull Shaver products with improved design and unbeatable performance. The new Pitbull Silver Plus is made of high-quality materials using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The shaver uses 22%* larger drive gear for stronger shaving capacity and better results. The strong casing ensures maximum protection and durable use for your shaver. IPX5 Water resistance technology Pitbull Silver Plus electric shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water-resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower, as well as easily rinsing your shaver under the running water. Naturally, Pitbull shavers are also perfectly adapted for dry shaving offering high-quality close shave and exceptional results. Pitbull Silver Plus gives you the freedom to shave the way you prefer. Wet or dry, with shaving foam or without. The results are impeccable each time. 60 minutes of cordless use Pitbull Silver Plus electric shaver is equipped with a powerful integrated lithium-ion battery (600 mAh) which allows quick charging and 60 minutes of cordless use. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at your convenience. This also makes Pitbull Silver Plus a must-have for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver also perfectly works in plug and shave mode: a great alternative in case you forgot to charge it. Battery life indicator Know exactly when your shaver should be charged. The Pit bull Silver Plus electric shaver is equipped with a LED light indicating the level of the battery, which is green when the shaver is charged and turns red once the battery runs low. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged. Two blades included Experience the exceptional close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered Pitbull Carver blades designed specifically for Pitbull Silver Plus ensuring great results and protection for your skin. The upgraded Pitbull Carver blades have 10%* larger cutting area, which significantly reduces the time spent on shaving. The precision blades are built in a strong casing for durable use and protection. The CR-3 Blades are perfect for face shaving. CR-3 Blades offer unique flexing and pivoting heads, allowing the blade to conform to tight contours and shave in tight spots. Flexing blades for extra reach Get an easy access and extra reach to all areas of your head, face, and neck thanks to the ultra flexible flexing shaver blades that closely follow every curve. Each of the five rotary heads have multi-directional rotation to adjust to the shape of your head without missing any single hair. The new and rebuilt Pitbull Silver Plus offers 33% more flexibility to ensure unbeatable performance and exceptional results. Easy Cleaning Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Platinum Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of Pitbull shavers. Simply place your shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. And that’s it. Your shaver is clean and ready for next use. Alternatively, you can use a bowl with water to clean your device.

The precision blades are built in a strong casing for durable use and protection. The CR-3 Blades are perfect for face shaving. CR-3 Blades offer unique flexing and pivoting heads, allowing the blade to conform to tight contours and shave in tight spots. Flexing blades for extra reach Get an easy access and extra reach to all areas of your head, face, and neck thanks to the ultra flexible flexing shaver blades that closely follow every curve. Each of the five rotary heads have multi-directional rotation to adjust to the shape of your head without missing any single hair. The new and rebuilt Pitbull Gold Plus offers 33% more flexibility to ensure unbeatable performance and exceptional results. Easy Cleaning Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Platinum Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of Pitbull shavers. Simply place your shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. And that’s it. Your shaver is clean and ready for next use. Alternatively, you can use a bowl with water to clean your device.
pitbull-gold-plus-head-and-face-shaver.descriptionHtml:
Innovative design for maximum comfort

A reinvented and remastered design with the use of best in class materials to offer unconventional comfort during shaving. Pitbull Gold is equipped with our signature patented innovative ergonomic handle which offers easy grip and perfectly fits your hand to ensure comfortable and intuitive shaving of your head and face. Thanks to the unique design the shaver easily gets to all tough to reach areas ensuring impeccable results.

Improved performance

Discover the third generation of Skull Shaver products with improved design and unbeatable performance. The new Pit bull Gold is made of high quality materials using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The shaver uses 22%* larger drive gear for stronger shaving capacity and better results. The strong casing ensures maximum protection and durable use for your shaver.

IPX5 Water resistance technology

Pitbull Gold electric shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower, as well as easily rinsing your shaver under the running water. Naturally, Pitbull men shavers are also perfectly adapted for dry shaving offering high quality close shave and exceptional results. Pitbull Gold gives you the freedom to shave the way you prefer. Wet or dry, with shaving foam or without. The results are impeccable each time.

90 minutes of cordless use

Pitbull Gold electric shaver is equipped with powerful integrated lithium-ion battery (1400 mAh) which allows quick charging and 90 minutes of cordless use. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at your convenience. This also makes Pitbull Gold a must-have for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver also perfectly works in plug and shave mode: a great alternative in case you forgot to charge it.

Battery life indicator

Know exactly when your shaver should be charged. The integrated LED illuminated LCD display clearly shows the battery level in percentages to make the daily use of your shaver even more practical. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged.

Two blades included

Two included blades allow you to choose the perfect shave for your skin. Experience the exceptional close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered Pitbull Forte blades made of best in class materials to ensure flawless results, at the same time gently protecting your skin. The upgraded Pitbull Forte blades have 10%* larger cutting area, which significantly reduces the time spent on shaving. The precision blades are built in a strong casing for durable use and protection. The CR-3 Blades are perfect for face shaving. CR-3 Blades offer unique flexing and pivoting heads, allowing the blade to conform to tight contours and shave in tight spots.

Flexing blades for extra reach

Get an easy access and extra reach to all areas of your head, face, and neck thanks to the ultra flexible flexing shaver blades that closely follow every curve. Each of the five rotary heads have multi-directional rotation to adjust to the shape of your head without missing any single hair. The new and rebuilt Pitbull Gold Plus offers 33% more flexibility to ensure unbeatable performance and exceptional results.

Easy Cleaning

Enjoy the simplicity of cleaning your shaver in less than a minute. For best results use the Platinum Rinse Stand (sold separately) specifically designed for easy cleaning and maintenance of Pitbull shavers. Simply place your shaver on the rinse stand and immerse the blades into warm water. Turn the shaver on and wait for 10-15 seconds. And that’s it. Your shaver is clean and ready for next use. Alternatively, you can use a bowl with water to clean your device.

skull-shaver-cr3-replacement-blade.description: The CR-3 Blade Skull Shaver 3 head Carver PRO blades are perfectly suited for both head and face shaving. The smaller blade profile more closely conforms to tightly contoured areas such as your chin or jawline. Experience the exceptionally close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered Carver PRO blades made of premium Japanese Stainless Steel to ensure flawless results. Carver PRO features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. The upgraded 3 head PRO blades have several advantages over 5 head designs and are great for covering a lot of area in a small amount of time: Shave Faster Skull Shaver PRO next-generation 3 head blades let you shave faster than our previous designs. Multi-directional rotary shaving heads let you shave in any direction. Shave up, down, left, right, whatever works best for you and for best results, we recommend shaving in small circular motions. Skull Shaver PRO blades have more cutting edges per shaving head than our previous generation blades, giving you 20% more cutting action per rotation. All this means a faster and closer shave and a perfect look everyday. Exceptional Contouring 3 head PRO blades contour and perfectly adjust to your head and face while shaving: each blade floats independently, allowing 360° of contouring and each floating blade is mounted in a flexing head that automatically adjusts for tighter or larger curves. This flexibility gives you better and even more coverage, so you don't have to keep going over trouble spots. Faster shave with no irritation! Superior Performance Skull Shaver PRO blades are made from premium hypo-allergenic Japanese stainless steel, which has the ability to provide and hold an extremely sharp edge while providing a long lifetime. Keeping the precision blades clean will provide you with the best performance and the longest blade lifetime. No Irritation Another great advantage of the newest PRO blades is extremely safe shave without any skin irritation. One of the biggest sources of irritation is pressing too hard. Skull Shaver PRO blades are spring-loaded and will fully retract into the housing if pressed too hard. The springs keep the perfect amount of pressure against your skin, greatly reducing irritation. If you do press too hard, the shaver will also slow down, giving you an audible reminder to lower the shaving pressure. Deeper Cleaning The availability of deeper cleaning extends blade life and keeps your shaves as smooth as day one. Removable PRO blades come off in a snap making it easy to give your blades a deep clean inside and out. Less Mess Due to the built-in vacuum technology, Skull Shaver PRO blades capture hair inside their large shaving chambers. Hair stays off your skin and shirt so you can always have a clean shave and look your best wherever you go. Built Stronger The all-new 3 head PRO blades by Skull Shaver are built stronger than any of our previous designs: the blades are suspended in a two-piece chassis to allow contouring flexibility while holding them securely in place. The drivetrain has been relocated to a sealed chamber to keep hair clippings out of the transmission, ensuring you always get consistent and smooth performance. Shave Wet or Dry Next-generation PRO blades work great for shaving both wet and dry. For wet shave use shaving cream, foam, or oil. We recommend wet shaving with shaving cream for the smoothest shave possible. Compatibility Upgraded 3 head PRO blades are compatible with all Pitbull, Palm, and Butterfly Kiss shavers. Find the style that suits you best We make Skull Shaver PRO blades in three styles: Carver, Forte, and Baron. If you had a favourite in our 5 head, you can simply choose the same style PRO blade. Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and bevelled foil mesh. Cutting performance between Carver and Forte is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and bevelled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features three cutting rings per shaving head: two with S-shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.

the beast clipper comes with an extra wide and strong clipping head. the extra width makes it faster to trim your beard, cut your hair, or trim body hair. the blades are also micro-adjustable by moving the switch on the back of the blades. the adjustment fine tunes the cutting length in sub-millimeter increments. this lets you fine tune the length or the amount of stubble left behind

the beast clipper was designed to make diy home haircuts easy enough for anyone to do. the dfferent available grip options make it easy to reach all parts of your head.
the patented design lets you grip the beast clipper between your fingers. thos grip makes it easy to trim the hair on the back of your head
the beast clipper can also be gripped by the handle to give you flexibility. combs slide on and off the blades and click into place when fully installed.

palm-head-and-face-shaver.description: Signature innovative handle Our Palm shavers have a unique innovative design and are equipped with our signature ergonomic handle that fits perfectly in the palm of your hand. Such an easy and comfortable grip gives more freedom and flexibility of movement that allows better access to hard to reach areas of your head. You can either hold the shaver between your fingers for an intuitive and convenient head shaving or grab the handle with your hand for a smooth and close shave of your face. Such an innovative approach allows you to save time and effort and bring the shaving to a whole new level. Ultra-precision blade Our Palm shaver is equipped with a CR-3 Blade designed with 3 unique large flexing and pivoting heads that ensure efficient close shaving for all types of skin. Each of the three rotary heads of the CR-3 Blade flexes independently allowing a close and precise cut in all areas of head and face. Cordless operation The shaver is equipped with a powerful integrated lithium-ion battery that provides up to 60 minutes cordless usage on a single charge. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at you prefer. This also makes the Palm Shaver very handy for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver is also safe to be used in plug and shave mode just in case you forgot to charge it. Water resistance technology The Palm electric men’s head and face shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower (please do not submerge the shaver). Ear/Nose trimmer attachment The Palm shaver comes with an ear/nose trimmer attachment. The ear/nose trimmer will help you get rid of unwanted hair in delicate areas without pain, pulling, or pinching. By choosing the Palm shaver, you are sure to get the most complete and efficient shaving kit to use every day. Easy cleaning Thanks to the built-in vacuum system all the hair is collected within the shaver to ensure fast and easy cleaning. To clean the CR-3 blade, simply open it up and hold it under running water to remove all the hair. Alternatively, use the Skull Shaver Rinse Stand (sold separately) or simply immerse the blades of the shaver into warm water while on. For best results and performance we advise cleaning the blades regularly.

Such an innovative approach allows you to save time and effort and bring the shaving to a whole new level.

Ultra-precision blade

Our Palm shaver is equipped with a CR-3 Blade designed with 3 unique large flexing and pivoting heads that ensure efficient close shaving for all types of skin. Each of the three rotary heads of the CR-3 Blade flexes independently allowing a close and precise cut in all areas of head and face.

Cordless operation

The shaver is equipped with a powerful integrated lithium-ion battery that provides up to 60 minutes cordless usage on a single charge. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at you prefer. This also makes the Palm Shaver very handy for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver is also safe to be used in plug and shave mode just in case you forgot to charge it.

Water resistance technology

The Palm electric men’s head and face shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower (please do not submerge the shaver).

Ear/Nose trimmer attachment

The Palm shaver comes with an ear/nose trimmer attachment. The ear/nose trimmer will help you get rid of unwanted hair in delicate areas without pain, pulling, or pinching. By choosing the Palm shaver, you are sure to get the most complete and efficient shaving kit to use every day.

Easy cleaning

Thanks to the built-in vacuum system all the hair is collected within the shaver to ensure fast and easy cleaning. To clean the CR-3 blade, simply open it up and hold it under running water to remove all the hair. Alternatively, use the Skull Shaver Rinse Stand (sold separately) or simply immerse the blades of the shaver into warm water while on. For best results and performance we advise cleaning the blades regularly.

carver-pro-replacement-blade.description: Skull Shaver PRO: Faster. Smoother. Stronger. Shave Faster Skull Shaver PRO blades let you shave faster than our previous designs. Multi directional rotary shaving heads let you shave in any direction. Shave up, down, left, right, whatever works best for you. For best results we recommend shaving in small circular motions. Skull Shaver PRO blades have more blades per shaving head than our previous generation blades, giving you 20% more cutting action per rotation. All this means a faster shave so you can get on with life. Exceptional Contouring Skull Shaver PRO contours specifically to your head or face while you shave. Each blade floats independently, allowing 360° of contouring. Each floating blade is mounted in a flexing head that automatically adjusts for tighter or larger curves. Combined this flexibility gives you better, more even coverage so you don't have to keep going over trouble spots. Faster shave, less irritation. Superior Performance Skull Shaver PRO blades are made from premium hypo-allergenic Japanese stainless steel. The steel was specifically chosen for its ability to provide and hold an extremely sharp edge while providing a long lifetime. Keeping the precision blades clean will provide you the longest blade lifetime and best performance. Less Irritation One of the biggest sources of irritation is pressing too hard. Skull Shaver PRO blades are spring loaded and will fully retract into the housing if pressed too hard. The springs keep the perfect amount of pressure against your skin, greatly reducing irritation. If you do press too hard, the shaver will also slow down, giving you an audible reminder to lower the shaving pressure. Deeper Cleaning Removable blades come off in a snap making it easy to give your blades a deep clean inside and out. Keeping your blades clean will greatly extend blade life and keep your shaves as smooth as day 1. Less Mess Skull Shaver PRO blades are designed to capture hair shavings inside their large shaving chambers. Hair stays off your skin and shirt so you can always have a clean shave and look your best wherever you go. Built Stronger The all new Skull Shaver PRO blades are built stronger than any of our previous designs. The blades are suspended in a two-piece chassis to allow contouring flexibility while holding them securely in place. The drivetrain has been relocated to a sealed chamber to keep hair clippings out of the transmission, ensuring you always get consistent and smooth performance. Shave Wet or Dry Skull Shaver PRO blades work great when shaving wet or dry. Shave with shaving cream, foam, or oil. We recommend wet shaving with shaving cream for the smoothest shave possible. Compatibility Skull Shaver PRO blades are compatible with all Pit bull, Palm, and Butterfly Kiss shavers. Find the style that suits you best We make Skull Shaver PRO blades in three styles: Carver, Forte, and Baron. If you had a favorite in our 5 head, you can simply choose the same style PRO blade. Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and beveled foil mesh. Cutting performance between Carver and Forte is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and beveled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features three cutting rings per shaving head: two with S shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.

pitbull-gold-pro-head-and-face-shaver.descriptionHtml:
What makes it so easy to use?

Innovative design for maximum comfort

A reinvented and remastered design with the use of best in class materials to offer unconventional comfort during shaving. Pitbull Gold PRO is equipped with our signature patented innovative ergonomic handle which offers easy grip and perfectly fits your hand to ensure comfortable and intuitive shaving of your head and face. Thanks to the unique design the shaver easily gets to all tough to reach areas ensuring impeccable results.

Professional performance

Discover the fourth generation of Skull Shaver products with improved design and unbeatable performance. The new Pitbull Gold PRO is made of high quality materials using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The shaver comes with our all new PRO blade design: a radical new design from Skull Shaver that promises the best performance and longevity yet.

Wet Shave in the Shower

Pitbull Gold PRO electric shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower (please do not submerge the shaver). Naturally, Pitbull men shavers are also perfectly adapted for dry shaving offering high-quality close shave and exceptional results. Pitbull Gold PRO gives you the freedom to shave the way you prefer. Wet or dry, with shaving foam or without. The results are impeccable each time.

Shave Anytime, Anywhere, with No Mess

Our electric head shavers were invented for travel and have it deep in their DNA. The Pitbull Gold PRO electric head shaver lets you shave comfortably wet or dry, so you can shave anytime and anywhere. The blade design captures hair clippings inside the shaving chambers and off your skin and shirt. Keep one in your car, office, or private jet for a quick shave on the go.

No Nicks. No Cuts.

The rotary shaving heads make fast work of your stubble, allowing you to safely shave in any direction. No more painful nicks, stinging cuts, or raised scars that keep getting knicked. Our rotary shaving heads glide smoothly over irregularities and have won over customers with trouble areas due to birthmarks, freckles, scars, or those who simply cannot afford to break the skin.

90 minutes of cordless use

Pitbull Gold PRO electric shaver is equipped with powerful integrated lithium-ion battery (1400 mAh) which allows quick charging and 90 minutes of cordless use. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at your convenience. This also makes Pitbull Gold a must-have for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver also perfectly works in plug and shave mode: a great alternative in case you forgot to charge it.

Battery life indicator

Know exactly when your shaver should be charged. The integrated LED illuminated LCD display clearly shows the battery level in percentages to make the daily use of your shaver even more practical. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged.

Forte blade included: Made for Head Shaving Face Shaving

Experience the exceptional close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered PRO blades made of premium Japanese Stainless Steel to ensure flawless results. The upgraded Pitbull PRO blades have several advantages over 5 head designs and are great for covering a lot of area in a small amount of time.

Shave Faster

Skull Shaver PRO blades let you shave faster than our previous designs. Multi directional rotary shaving heads let you shave in any direction. Shave up, down, left, right, whatever works best for you. For best results we recommend shaving in small circular motions. Skull Shaver PRO blades have more blades per shaving head than our previous generation blades, giving you 20% more cutting action per rotation. All this means a faster shave so you can get on with life.

Exceptional Contouring

Skull Shaver PRO contours specifically to your head or face while you shave. Each blade floats independently, allowing 360° of contouring. Each floating blade is mounted in a flexing head that automatically adjusts for tighter or larger curves. Combined this flexibility gives you better, more even coverage so you don't have to keep going over trouble spots. Faster shave, less irritation.

Superior Performance

Skull Shaver PRO blades are made from premium hypo-allergenic Japanese stainless steel. The steel was specifically chosen for its ability to provide and hold an extremely sharp edge while providing a long lifetime. Keeping the precision blades clean will provide you the longest blade lifetime and best performance.

Less Irritation

One of the biggest sources of irritation is pressing too hard. Skull Shaver PRO blades are spring loaded and will fully retract into the housing if pressed too hard. The springs keep the perfect amount of pressure against your skin, greatly reducing irritation. If you do press too hard, the shaver will also slow down, giving you an audible reminder to lower the shaving pressure.

Deeper Cleaning

Removable blades come off in a snap making it easy to give your blades a deep clean inside and out. Keeping your blades clean will greatly extend blade life and keep your shaves as smooth as day 1.

Less Mess

Skull Shaver PRO blades are designed to capture hair shavings inside their large shaving chambers. Hair stays off your skin and shirt so you can always have a clean shave and look your best wherever you go.

Built Stronger

The all new Skull Shaver PRO blades are built stronger than any of our previous designs. The blades are suspended in a two-piece chassis to allow contouring flexibility while holding them securely in place. The drivetrain has been relocated to a sealed chamber to keep hair clippings out of the transmission, ensuring you always get consistent and smooth performance.

Shave Wet or Dry

Skull Shaver PRO blades work great when shaving wet or dry. Shave with shaving cream, foam, or oil. We recommend wet shaving with shaving cream for the smoothest shave possible.

Compatibility

Skull Shaver PRO blades are compatible with all Pitbull, Palm, and Butterfly Kiss shavers.

Find the style that suits you best

We make Skull Shaver PRO blades in three styles: Carver, Forte, and Baron. If you had a favorite in our 5 head, you can simply choose the same style PRO blade. Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and beveled foil mesh. Cutting performance between Carver and Forte is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and beveled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features three cutting rings per shaving head: two with S shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.

The drivetrain has been relocated to a sealed chamber to keep hair clippings out of the transmission, ensuring you always get consistent and smooth performance. Shave Wet or Dry Skull Shaver PRO blades work great when shaving wet or dry. Shave with shaving cream, foam, or oil. We recommend wet shaving with shaving cream for the smoothest shave possible. Compatibility Skull Shaver PRO blades are compatible with all Skull Shaver, Palm, and Butterfly Kiss shavers. Find the style that suits you best We make Skull Shaver PRO blades in three styles: Carver, Forte, and Baron. If you had a favorite in our 5 head, you can simply choose the same style PRO blade. Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and beveled foil mesh. Cutting performance between Carver and Forte is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and beveled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features three cutting rings per shaving head: two with S shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.
skull-shaver-gold-pro-head-and-face-shav.descriptionHtml:
Skull Shaver Gold PRO: Available only in European and Australian markets.

Innovative design for maximum comfort

A reinvented and remastered design with the use of best in class materials to offer unconventional comfort during shaving. Skull Shaver Gold PRO is equipped with our signature patented innovative ergonomic handle which offers easy grip and perfectly fits your hand to ensure comfortable and intuitive shaving of your head and face. Thanks to the unique design the shaver easily gets to all tough to reach areas ensuring impeccable results. The Skull Shaver Gold PRO is similar to our Pitbull Gold PRO, but with a different logo on the front. This model is only available in European and Australian markets.

Professional performance

Discover the fourth generation of Skull Shaver products with improved design and unbeatable performance. The new Skull Shaver Gold PRO is made of high quality materials using technically advanced equipment and production facilities. The shaver comes with our all new PRO blade design: a radical new design from Skull Shaver that promises the best performance and longevity yet.

Wet Shave in the Shower

Skull Shaver Gold PRO electric shaver uses IPX5 technology and is water resistant giving you the freedom and convenience of shaving in the shower, as well as easily rinsing your shaver under the running water. Naturally, Skull Shaver men shavers are also perfectly adapted for dry shaving offering high quality close shave and exceptional results. Skull Shaver Gold PRO gives you the freedom to shave the way you prefer. Wet or dry, with shaving foam or without. The results are impeccable each time.

Shave Anytime, Anywhere, with No Mess

Our electric head shavers were invented for travel and have it deep in their DNA. The Skull Shaver Gold PRO electric head shaver lets you shave comfortably wet or dry, so you can shave anytime and anywhere. The blade design captures hair clippings inside the shaving chambers and off your skin and shirt. Keep one in your car, office, or private jet for a quick shave on the go.

No Nicks. No Cuts.

The rotary shaving heads make fast work of your stubble, allowing you to safely shave in any direction. No more painful nicks, stinging cuts, or raised scars that keep getting knicked. Our rotary shaving heads glide smoothly over irregularities and have won over customers with trouble areas due to birthmarks, freckles, scars, or those who simply cannot afford to break the skin.

90 minutes of cordless use

Skull Shaver Gold PRO electric shaver is equipped with powerful integrated lithium-ion battery (1400 mAh) which allows quick charging and 90 minutes of cordless use. This gives you the freedom to shave anywhere and anytime at your convenience. This also makes Skull Shaver Gold a must-have for travelers who often need a quick shave on the go. The shaver also perfectly works in plug and shave mode: a great alternative in case you forgot to charge it.

Battery life indicator

Know exactly when your shaver should be charged. The integrated LED illuminated LCD display clearly shows the battery level in percentages to make the daily use of your shaver even more practical. The performance of the shaver remains steadily strong until fully discharged.

Forte Blade included for Head and Face Shaving

The included Forte blade for your Skull Shaver Gold PRO shaver allows you to shave your head or face wet or dry. Experience the exceptional close and safe shave thanks to the re-engineered PRO blades made of premium Japanese Stainless Steel to ensure flawless results. The upgraded Skull Shaver PRO blades have several advantages over 5 head designs and are great for covering a lot of area in a small amount of time.

Shave Faster

Skull Shaver PRO blades let you shave faster than our previous designs. Multi directional rotary shaving heads let you shave in any direction. Shave up, down, left, right, whatever works best for you. For best results we recommend shaving in small circular motions. Skull Shaver PRO blades have more blades per shaving head than our previous generation blades, giving you 20% more cutting action per rotation. All this means a faster shave so you can get on with life.

Exceptional Contouring

Skull Shaver PRO contours specifically to your head or face while you shave. Each blade floats independently, allowing 360° of contouring. Each floating blade is mounted in a flexing head that automatically adjusts for tighter or larger curves. Combined this flexibility gives you better, more even coverage so you don't have to keep going over trouble spots. Faster shave, less irritation.

Superior Performance

Skull Shaver PRO blades are made from premium hypo-allergenic Japanese stainless steel. The steel was specifically chosen for its ability to provide and hold an extremely sharp edge while providing a long lifetime. Keeping the precision blades clean will provide you the longest blade lifetime and best performance.

Less Irritation

One of the biggest sources of irritation is pressing too hard. Skull Shaver PRO blades are spring loaded and will fully retract into the housing if pressed too hard. The springs keep the perfect amount of pressure against your skin, greatly reducing irritation. If you do press too hard, the shaver will also slow down, giving you an audible reminder to lower the shaving pressure.

Deeper Cleaning

Removable blades come off in a snap making it easy to give your blades a deep clean inside and out. Keeping your blades clean will greatly extend blade life and keep your shaves as smooth as day 1.

Less Mess

Skull Shaver PRO blades are designed to capture hair shavings inside their large shaving chambers. Hair stays off your skin and shirt so you can always have a clean shave and look your best wherever you go.

Built Stronger

The all new Skull Shaver PRO blades are built stronger than any of our previous designs. The blades are suspended in a two-piece chassis to allow contouring flexibility while holding them securely in place. The drivetrain has been relocated to a sealed chamber to keep hair clippings out of the transmission, ensuring you always get consistent and smooth performance.

Shave Wet or Dry

Skull Shaver PRO blades work great when shaving wet or dry. Shave with shaving cream, foam, or oil. We recommend wet shaving with shaving cream for the smoothest shave possible.

Compatibility

Skull Shaver PRO blades are compatible with all Skull Shaver, Palm, and Butterfly Kiss shavers.

Find the style that suits you best

We make Skull Shaver PRO blades in three styles: Carver, Forte, and Baron. If you had a favorite in our 5 head, you can simply choose the same style PRO blade. Carver features dual cutting rings and flat foil mesh. Carver is recommended for coarse hair. Forte features dual cutting rings and beveled foil mesh. Cutting performance between Carver and Forte is similar, although Forte will feel smoother as it glides across your skin due to the curved and beveled foils. Forte is our most popular and is the best choice for most people. Baron features three cutting rings per shaving head: two with S shaped openings, and one cutting ring with dots. Those with sensitive skin and fine hair will love this style.
